question.short: What proportion of trans people detransition?
question.long: What proportion of transgender people detransition?

description: Results from studies evaluating the proportion of transgender people who permanently detransition or regret transitioning.

no_consensus.description: The literature has not yet reached a consensus on the proportion of transgender people who permanently detransition or regret transitioning

less_than_1p.description: The literature suggests that less than 1% of transgender people permanently detransition or regret transitioning
